item.title: Kubernetes Encryption
item.description: Kubernetes Encryption Beginning in CSM 1.3, support is enabled for data encryption in etcd for Kubernetes secrets at rest. This controller is deployed by default in CSM with the cray-kubernetes-encryption Helm chart. By default, encryption is not enabled and must be enabled after install. Note that control plane is used in this document elsewhere master or management nodes may be used. Control plane is used to be consistent with upstream Kubernetes documentation.
